title: Last Week's Top Stories - Trump Wears a Mask, California Closes Again & LAPD Fakes Gang Data
itunes:title: Last Week's Top Stories - Trump Wears a Mask, California Closes Again & LAPD Fakes Gang Data
description:
President Trump finally wears a mask in public as coronavirus cases soar, California Governor Gavin Newsom reverses his state's reopening, and the LAPD falsifies gang data.
